boose/BOOSE_Project.AppCanvas.html.title: Class AppCanvas | BOOSE Picasso
boose/BOOSE_Project.AppCanvas.html.summary: Class AppCanvas Namespace BOOSE_Project Assembly BOOSE_Project.dll AppCanvas class implements the ICanvas interface. It provides several methods and properties to manage different operation in the drawing canvas. public class AppCanvas : ICanvas Inheritance object AppCanvas Implements ICanvas Inherited Members object.Equals(object) object.Equals(object, object) object.GetHashCode() object.GetType() object.MemberwiseClone() object.ReferenceEquals(object, object) object.ToString() Constructors AppCanvas(int, int) AppCanvas() is the class constructor for the AppCanvas class. Sets all the values to default using the Set() method. Including the drawing bitmap size, graphics object, pen, brush, font and initial position of the drawing pointer. public AppCanvas(int xSize, int ySize) Parameters xSize int the width of the drawing bitmap ySize int the height of the drawing bitmap Fields drawingBitmap public Bitmap drawingBitmap Field Value Bitmap font public Font font Field Value Font graphics public Graphics graphics Field Value Graphics pen public Pen pen Field Value Pen penColor public Color penColor Field Value Color solidBrush public SolidBrush solidBrush Field Value SolidBrush Properties PenColour PenColour getter and setter for the color of the drawing pointer. public object PenColour { get; set; } Property Value object Xpos Xpos getter and setter for the X position of the drawing pointer. public int Xpos { get; set; } Property Value int Ypos Ypos getter and setter for the Y position of the drawing pointer. public int Ypos { get; set; } Property Value int Methods Circle(int, bool) Circle() draws a circle at current position with specified radius. public void Circle(int radius, bool filled) Parameters radius int the specified parameters to decide the size of the circle filled bool whether filling the shape or not Clear() Clear() clears the canvas by setting the background color to default. public void Clear() DrawTo(int, int) DrawTo() draws a line from current drawing pointer to specified x,y. Leave the drawing pointer at x,y. public void DrawTo(int x, int y) Parameters x int x position y int y position MoveTo(int, int) MoveTo() moves the drawing pointer to specified x,y. public void MoveTo(int x, int y) Parameters x int x position y int y position Rect(int, int, bool) Rect() draws a rectangle at current position with specified width and height. public void Rect(int width, int height, bool filled) Parameters width int the width of the rectangle height int the height of the rectangle filled bool choose whether to fill the rectangle shape or not Reset() Reset() resets the x y position to 0,0. public void Reset() Set(int, int) Set() sets and initialise the: drawing bitmap and graphics objects default x,y position of the drawing cursor pen, pen color, solid brush font, font size public void Set(int width, int height) Parameters width int the width of the drawing bitmap height int the height of the drawing bitmap SetColour(int, int, int) SetColour() sets the color of the pen, and the pen brush object in RGB format. public void SetColour(int red, int green, int blue) Parameters red int Red parameter in RGB green int Green parameter in RGB blue int Blue parameter in RGB Tri(int, int) Tri() draws an isosceles triangle at current position with specified width and height. public void Tri(int width, int height) Parameters width int the width of the triangle height int the height of the triangle WriteText(string) WriteText() writes a specified text at current pointer position. public void WriteText(string text) Parameters text string the declared text to be draw on the canvas getBitmap() getBitmap() provides the drawing bitmap of the canvas. public object getBitmap() Returns object the drawing bitmap of the canvas

boose/BOOSE_Project.ThePicassoApp.html.summary: Class ThePicassoApp Namespace BOOSE_Project Assembly BOOSE_Project.dll thePicassoApp class is a drawing app that does several basic operations. boose/BOOSE_Project.html.title: Namespace BOOSE_Project | BOOSE Picasso
boose/BOOSE_Project.html.summary: Namespace BOOSE_Project Classes AppCanvas AppCanvas class implements the ICanvas interface. It provides several methods and properties to manage different operation in the drawing canvas. AppCircle AppCircle class implements the CommandOneParameter abstract class. Overrides the Execute() and CheckParameters() methods to draw a circle, and validates the parameters. AppDrawTo AppDrawTo class implements the CommandTwoParameters abstract class. Overrides the Execute() and CheckParameters() methods to draw a line, and validates the parameters. AppMoveTo AppMoveTo class implements the CommandTwoParameters abstract class. Overrides the Execute() and CheckParameters() methods to move the drawing cursor, and validates the parameters. AppPenColour AppPenColour class implements the CommandThreeParameters abstract class. Overrides the Execute() and CheckParameters() methods to change the pen color, and validates the parameters. AppRect AppRect class implements the CommandTwoParameters abstract class. Overrides the Execute() and CheckParameters() methods to draw a rectangle, and validates the parameters. AppTri AppTri class implements the CommandTwoParameters abstract class. Overrides the Execute() and CheckParameters() methods to draw a triangle, and validates the parameters. AppWrite AppWrite class implements the CanvasCommand abstract class. Overrides Execute() to evaluate its parameters, and draw a string on the canvas. Overrides CheckParameters() to validates the parameters. ThePicassoApp thePicassoApp class is a drawing app that does several basic operations. Such as: drawing shapes with mouse cursor or typed in commands, changing pen color and stroke width, and clearing the canvas. Additionally, it supports syntax highlighting in the text command input field.
